TEXT.TITLE: U.S. HOME <UH> IN NEW CREDIT AGREEMENT
TEXT.BODY:
U.S. Home Corp said it combined two existing credit and term loan contracts into a new credit agreement totalling 222.3 mln dlrs with 18 commerical banks. The new maturity date is April 30, 1988, it said.
Reuter
